---
title: "Streamline document to run milkweed SDMs"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(spocc)
library(spThin)
library(dismo)
library(sf)
library(ENMeval)
library(wallace)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
source("scripts/addLegend_decreasing.R")
source("scripts/setup.R")
source("maxent/milkweed_maxent.R")
```

### Run species distribution model
```{r}
calmod <- milkweed_maxent(californica_points, envs_Ac2, lpnf_south_buffered)
```

### Evaluate 
```{r}
calmod@results %>%
  select(auc.train) %>%
  summarise(max(auc.train))
```

### Select model based on AUC evaluation
```{r}
m_Ac <- model_Ac@models[["fc.LQ_rm.1"]] # change this for different models
predSel_Ac <- predictMaxnet(m_Ac, bgMask_Ac,
                                          type = "cloglog", # change for different types
                                          clamp = FALSE)
```
